title: China Boasts 27,000 Individuals With a Net Worth Above US$30 Million
text:
Shanghai has the largest number of ultra-high-net-worth individuals in China. Ding Junhao/Visual China Group via Getty Images

Text size

China has 27,000 ultra-high-net-worth individuals (UHNW)—those whose assets are valued above US$30 million, according to a report Wednesday by Wealth-X.

The figure is 46% more than it previously identified, said Wealth-X, a global wealth information and insight provider said. The new data was compiled due to a significant expansion of the group’s coverage in China during 2019.
description: Wealth-X finds Shanghai, Beijing, and Shenzhen are the country’s wealthiest cities
